channel.title: Help with range please
channel.description: ok i have range and everything set up but when i try to use range on my server i have to be next to the npc or person jus to use my range. how can i change it were i can shoot range from afar and even use long range as well. please can someone help me. i think i deserve a little help i have made it this far in making this server myself.

item.title: Help with range please

item.description:
@SC4RF4C3 wrote:

ok i have range and everything set up but when i try to use range on my server i have to be next to the npc or person jus to use my range. how can i change it were i can shoot range from afar and even use long range as well. please can someone help me. i think i deserve a little help i have made it this far in making this server myself.
